H0.text: Mykonos, Naxos and Santorini are in which group of Greek islands. Dodecanese

H1.text: Mykonos, Naxos and Santorini are in which group of Greek islands. Sporades

H2.text: Mykonos, Naxos and Santorini are in which group of Greek islands. Ionian Islands

H3.text: Mykonos, Naxos and Santorini are in which group of Greek islands. Κυκλάς

A4.text: The Cyclades includes about 220 islands, the major ones being Amorgos, Anafi, Andros, Antiparos, Delos, Ios, Kea, Kimolos, Kythnos, Milos, Mykonos, Naxos, Paros, Folegandros, Serifos, Sifnos, Sikinos, Syros, Tinos, and Thira or Santoríni.

A5.text: The Cyclades is an island group in the Aegean Sea, southeast of mainland Greece and a former administrative prefecture of Greece.
